title: Show HN: Crovia – offline-verifiable AI royalty evidence (CEP.v1)
description:
Crovia generates a single ~8 KB file (CEP.v1) containing: 
• trust bundle (EU AI Act ready)• royalty receipts from real FAISS provenance• payouts summary + Gini coefficient 
• full hashchain• compliance metadataZero cloud, zero blockchain, fully offline-verif…
content:
Open, minimal audit pack that turns AI training-data attribution logs into:
  • per-provider payouts,
  • an offline-verifiable trust bundle,
  • an EU AI Actstyle compliance summary,
